ref: 8443 prákirati ʻ scatters ʼ ŚBr. &rcirclemacr Pa. pakirati ʻ scatters, lets down (hair) ʼ; Pk. (with anal. -- kk -- ) pakkiramāṇa -- ʻ being thrown ʼ (païṇṇa -- see next); Bhoj. pairā ʻ scattering seed broadcast ʼ; M. perṇẽ ʻ to scatter, strew, spill, sow ʼ (LM 370 wrongly < pradará -- ); Si. (SigGr) pihira -- ʻ to scatter, strew, comb (the hair) ʼ.
